at.fhv.itb3.mpu9462.ue5.ex2.binaryheap

Class BinaryHeap<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.fhv.itb3.mpu9462.ue5.ex2.binaryheap.BinaryHeap<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of value that is handled by an Object of this class. Must extend Comparable.

    public class BinaryHeap<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can save specified values in order of their priority (decided by a comparator). Structure is that of a Leftist Height Biased Tree.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  BinaryHeap.Node
      Binary Node class that saves a specified value.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BinaryHeap

        public BinaryHeap(java.util.Comparator<T> c)
        Constructor; Creates a new BinaryHeap Object.
        Parameters:
        c - Comparator that is used to determine Priority of added values of this Heap. Must implement Comparator interface

    • Method Detail

      • enqueue

        public void enqueue(T value)
        Queues a new value onto the Heap. Value will merged into the tree as to not violate the law that nodes are ordered in descending priority.
        Parameters:
        value - That is added to the Heap.

      • dequeue

        public T dequeue()
          throws java.util.NoSuchElementException
        Returns the value of highest Priority. (Will always return root, since root is always of highest priority) The resulting two trees will be merged.
        Returns:
        root value
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if root == null

      • merge

        private BinaryHeap.Node merge(BinaryHeap.Node treeNode,
                              BinaryHeap.Node newNode)
        Recursive function that merges two root Nodes together to a tree. The bigger node of the two will become the new root. Bigger -> The node which is deemed of higher priority by the comparator of this tree. Comparator is added in the constructor of this class, and can be custom-made.
        Parameters:
        treeNode - The root node that is already on the tree.
        newNode - The root node that gets added and merged with the other.

      • pathToLeaf

        private int pathToLeaf(BinaryHeap.Node n)
        Recursive function that finds the shortest path to a leaf(nil-node).
        Parameters:
        n - Node that starts the count at first, when called in recursion, child-node of the previous.
        Returns:
        The number of nodes that have to be passed to get to a leaf(nil-node).

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns:
        true if root is null, therefore tree is empty
